who am I?

My name is Tomas Wandahl, but I bet you already knew that. After all, you are currently viewing my website, and my name is right there in the URL. You don't need the skill-set of Sherlock Holmes in order to deduce my name.


I am a web-developer who currently lives and works in Stockholm, Sweden (59°19′46″N 18°4′7″Ö). I have studied Computer Science at the Royal Institute of Technology, and since I left school i've been working at a media company called Everysport Media Group AB. As of the fall of 2019, I am working at a different company called IC Control Media & Sport AB.


my big goal in life is to be a jedi master when it comes to fullstack-development, even though my heart is beating a little bit extra for the frontend-side.
